Headline: Temporary Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express Reroute near Michigan/Adams
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Michigan/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Adams, State, Washington, Michigan, and resume normal service, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Northbound #14 Jeffrey Express Reroute near Michigan/Adams
ShortDescription: Northbound 14 Jeffrey buses are temporarily rerouted near Michigan/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #14 Jeffrey buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Adams, State, Madison and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are rr via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn & 55th, due to police activity nr 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 55th, due to police activity near 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.
